name: Glompo Kart
description:
Race against the clock or other players through our ghost racer system. Your time to complete three laps is recorded and a ghostly replay of you will be added into the pool to race against. Try to get the high score on the leader board!

Submission to Hack K-State 2020.

Keyboard Controls

Accelerate: W
Decelerate: S
Steer Left: A
Steer Right: D
Use Power-up: Left Shift
Drift: Space (must be steering left or right)
Quit: Escape
Start/Continue game: Enter
